characters: Two young individuals are seen crossing the road. One is wearing a light-colored jacket and dark pants, while the other is wearing a darker jacket and light pants. They are crossing the road together. Later, a person is lying on the road.
summary: The video shows a car driving on a road at night. Two pedestrians suddenly appear and cross the road in front of the car. The car continues driving. At the end of the video, a person is lying on the road.
actions: The vehicle is driving straight on a road at night. The driver maintains a consistent speed until pedestrians appear in the road, at which point the driver likely decelerates to avoid a collision. The driver then continues driving straight.
key_objects: 1) Center: Two pedestrians, medium distance, crossing the road unsafely. 2) Center: Person lying on the road, medium distance, creating a road hazard.
